name: Coastal Cod
description: Dependable white fish, easy to salt and store.

name: Estuary Salmon
description: Fatty fish that sustains both peasants and nobles.

name: Smokefin
description: Oily fish that smokes well for long voyages.

name: Storm Tuna
description: Massive ocean fish that can feed whole districts.

name: Abyssal Eel
description: Glowing deep-sea eel saturated with primal mana.

name: Sea Salt
description: Crystallized salt for preserving food and rituals.

name: Rock Salt
description: Coarse salt quarried from old seabeds.

name: Starlit Coral
description: Gleaming coral used in tidal wards and focus arrays.

name: Whispering Coral
description: Faintly humming coral favored by sea shamans.

name: River Pearls
description: Modest pearls that still fetch a decent price.

name: Moon Pearls
description: Lustrous gems that glow softly under starlight.
